purpose: Measure the undervoltage lockout (UVLO) rising and falling thresholds.
scope: Applies to all DUTs with UVLO circuitry enabled.
setup: Connect DUT to programmable supply. Configure to sweep V+ slowly through the UVLO range. Monitor UVLO status or switch node state.
procedure:
1. Start with V+ below UVLO threshold.
2. Increase V+ in 0.1 V steps until DUT enables.
3. Decrease V+ in 0.1 V steps until DUT disables.
4. Repeat for three units.
measurement: Record V+ at each enable and disable event. Compute average and spread across units.
acceptancecriteria: UVLO rising and falling thresholds must meet design specification with appropriate hysteresis.

measurement_settings.other_settings: 0.1 V steps, dwell 1 s per step.
